qas.question: How many workers commute into the municipality?
How many workers had to commute away from the municipality?
How much of the working population uses public transportation?
How many of the working population use private cars?

context: In 2000[update], there were <a0_0>94,367<a0_0/> workers who commuted into the municipality and <a1_0>16,424<a1_0/> workers who commuted away. The municipality is a net importer of workers, with about 5.7 workers entering the municipality for every one leaving. Of the working population, <a2_0>50.6%<a2_0/> used public transport to get to work, and <a3_0>20.6%<a3_0/> used a private car.
